nodes.name: Javascript
nodes.description: I build websites and applications with a firm grasp of ES6 Javascript concepts and paradigms. I work with modern workflow tools (Babel, Gulp, Webpack, ESLint, NPM, Jasmine, Enzyme) to write testable and maintainable code.

nodes.name: React
nodes.description: I'm an experienced React developer with the skills needed to compose user interface components using modern React APIs including Hooks, Context and Redux

nodes.name: HTML 5 / CSS 3
nodes.description: I write semantic markup with clean, cascading style sheets to match. CSS Modules, Sass, Less, BEM, SMACSS, Bootstrap, Photoshop, Figma, and Sketch are all in my toolbox.

nodes.name: Development
nodes.description: I work in a Mac or Linux desktop environment. I'm an experienced command-line git user (branching, merging, rebasing, etc) and know how to contribute on a team of developers (code reviews, pull requests, etc)

nodes.name: Server Side
nodes.description: I have extensive experience building front-ends for systems using PHP, Java, C# / .NET, and have handled backend responsibilities with CMS systems like Wordpress.

nodes.name: HTML Email
nodes.description: The task nobody seems to want - I'm well versed of what can, can't, should and shouldn't be done with HTML emails. I build HTML emails that support mobile and desktop for the best and worst email clients.
